feed.title: Combined summary - BIPs - notarization protocol and decentralized storage protocol

entry.title: Combined summary - BIPs - notarization protocol and decentralized storage protocol
entry.summary: A member of the Bitcoin community named Chris has created two new BIPs (Bitcoin Improvement Proposals) related to a BIP he sent out last week. The first BIP, called storage, can be found on GitHub at https://github.com/cgilliard/bips/blob/storage/bip-XXXX.mediawiki, while the second BIP, named notarization, is available at https://github.com/cgilliard/bips/blob/notarization-l2/bip-XXXX.mediawiki. Chris is requesting feedback or comments on these new BIPs.Robert Spigler has shown interest in using Bitcoin/LN by Storj/Sia instead of an alternative and in response, Christopher Gilliard sent two additional BIPs associated with the BIP he previously sent to the bitcoin-dev mailing list. The first BIP focuses on storage and can be found on GitHub, while the second one pertains to notarization. Chris is seeking feedback or comments on these new BIPs.
